issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add tests to TPC-H benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10712](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10712). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To avoid regressions, we should add tests in the benchmark crate to at least parse and plan the queries.

We could also run the benchmarks if an environment variable is defined that points to the SF=1 data set and verify that the correct results are returned.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10712?focusedCommentId=17244371) by Mike Seddon (MikeSeddonAU):*
I would like to volunteer to do work on the TPC-H benchmarks once this is merged:
 \* add the rest of the tables
 \* add additional tests
 \* add the rest of the queries
 \* update the csv-parquet conversion process

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10712?focusedCommentId=17244574) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Thanks `[~MikeSeddonAU]` I appreciate that! I have added you as a contributor in Jira so you should be able to create issues and assign them to yourself.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10712?focusedCommentId=17255647) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9015
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9015>
